Introduction

Mika, also known as MikaL, is a South Korean singer and musical acror. He is a former member of the groups Singing In The Rain (2008), Xing (2008-2009), and the former leader and main vocalist of the group DGNA. He departed from DGNA in 2018.

As of 2023 he has been active in Japan.
